SEARCH
Module com.example.cab302simplestock
Package com.example.cab302simplestock.model

Interface IViewUserManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
ViewUserManager
public interface IViewUserManager
Interface for a ViewUser manager defining the CRUD methods for a viewUser DAO and extra methods for searching for viewUser and other related database entities. The manager is used to manage the relation between users and groups, a viewUser is a user with access to a specific group. The access a user has with a group depends on the implementation of the application and how it uses the viewUser entity.

  • Method Details

    • addViewUser

      int addViewUser(ViewUser viewUser)
      CRUD method to add a new ViewUser to the database.
      Parameters:
      viewUser - The viewUser to add to the database.
      Returns:
      The ID of the newly added viewUser.

    • updateViewUser

      void updateViewUser(ViewUser viewUser)
      CRUD method to update an existing viewUser in the database. Which viewUser to update depends on is implementation specific, any value can be used.
      Parameters:
      viewUser - The viewUser to update,

    • deleteViewUser

      void deleteViewUser(ViewUser viewUser)
      CRUD method to delete a viewUser in the database. Finding which viewUser to delete is implementation specific, any unique values of a viewUser can be used. If this is called it should be assumed the viewUser is gone and is unrecoverable.
      Parameters:
      viewUser - The viewUser to delete, only values used to find it needs to have anything in them.

    • getAllViewUsers

      List<ViewUser> getAllViewUsers()
      CRUD method to read and get all viewUsers that exist in the database.
      Returns:
      A list of all viewUsers that exist.

    • getUsersInGroup

      List<User> getUsersInGroup(int groupID)
      Finds and gets all users that have access to a group.
      Parameters:
      groupID - The group to find which users have access to.
      Returns:
      A list of all users with access to the group.

    • findUserInGroup

      User findUserInGroup(int userID, int groupID)
      Searches for and gets a user in a group based on the users ID
      Parameters:
      userID - The ID of the users to search for.
      groupID - The ID of the group to search in.
      Returns:
      The user if found in the group, i.e. the user has access to the group.

    • addUserToGroup

      int addUserToGroup(User user, int groupID)
      Grants access for a user to a specific group. Should create a viewUser with the user and group for its values.
      Parameters:
      user - The user to grant access to.
      groupID - The ID of the group the user should have access to.
      Returns:
      The ID of the newly created viewUser.

    • deleteUserFromGroup

      void deleteUserFromGroup(int userID, int groupID)
      Deletes a viewUser from the database, akin to removing access to a group for a user.
      Parameters:
      userID - The ID of the user the viewUser references.
      groupID - The ID of the group the viewUser references.

    • findViewUser

      ViewUser findViewUser(int userID, int groupID)
      Finds and gets a viewUser based on the user and group it references.
      Parameters:
      userID - The ID of the user it references.
      groupID - The ID of the group it references.
      Returns:
      The found viewUser.
